content.body: is there a preferred convention for single-line vs multi-line if statements in ecma262?

> 1. If ? SomethingBad(_input_) is **true**, throw a **TypeError** exception.

vs

> 1. If ? SomethingBad(_input_) is **true**, then
>    a. Throw a **TypeError** exception.
content.formatted_body:
1. If ? SomethingBad(input) is true, throw a TypeError exception.

vs

  1. If ? SomethingBad(input) is true, then
    a. Throw a TypeError exception.
